new_generated_rule_explanation: The rule 'missing-or-empty-prefix-in-configmapping' checks all classes in the project. If a class has the '@io.smallrye.config.ConfigMapping' annotation, it retrieves the 'prefix' attribute of the annotation. It then asserts that the 'prefix' attribute is not empty. If the 'prefix' attribute is empty, it generates a message indicating that the 'prefix' attribute value in the '@ConfigMapping' annotation is missing or empty in the specific class.
